userId.description: The global Id of the user

startTime.description: The start time of the activity

endTime.description: The start time of the activity

type.description: The type of activity, such as walking, running, cycling

source.description: The name of the originating service.

sourceData.description: Additional data from the source that does not fit into the humanapi model. This data can include things such as "Fuel points" for the Nike service.

createdAt.description: The time the activity was created on the Human API server

updatedAt.description: The time the activity was updated on the Human API server
